apiServer.assetEnvironment: environment used to create and retrieve assets (local, onprem, dev or prod)
apiServer.authOrigin: origin to use for third-party auth callbacks
apiServer.callbackEnvironment: allows for callbacks through VPN to developers' local servers
apiServer.confirmCodeExpiration: how long a confirmation code remains valid (in millisecs, default = 1 week)
apiServer.confirmationExpiration: how long a token for email confirmation remains valid (in millisecs, default = 1 day)
apiServer.confirmationNotRequired: set to true to disable email confirmation
apiServer.dontWantAWS: set to true so API server will not use any AWS services
apiServer.forgotPasswordExpiration: how long a token for forgot-password remains valid (in millisecs, default = 1 day)
apiServer.mockMode: for running tests on same host; nothing is saved to a database and PubNub is replaced by IPC
apiServer.port: Network port for the api service
apiServer.publicApiUrl: public url to access the API server from beyond
apiServer.runTimeEnvironment: run-time environment; use sparingly with preference for more specific params
apiServer.sessionAwayTimeout: how long before we call a user 'away' from keyboard (in millisecs)
apiServer.signupTokenExpiration: how long a signup token issued by the IDE for a user to signup on web remains valid (in millisecs, default = 10 min)

codestreamBroadcaster.host: hostname of the broadcaster service (from client point-of-view)
codestreamBroadcaster.port: Network port for the broadcaster service

secrets.api: used to generate json web tokens for authentication tokens passed to the client
secrets.auth: used to privilege certain api server requests to the broadcaster service

email.emailTo: Divert all email to this address
email.notificationInterval: Frequency email is generated (in millisecs, default = 30 secs)
email.replyToDomain: email domain for routing replies back to codestream
email.senderEmail: all generated emails will be sent as this user
email.supportEmail: support email address to include on email and forms
email.suppressEmails: Stop all email from being sent

inboundEmailServer.inboundEmailDirectory: new email files will be delivered to this directory by the mail agent
inboundEmailServer.processDirectory: email files will be moved to this directory for processing
inboundEmailServer.tempAttachmentDirectory: attachments in incoming emails will be stored temporarily here

<appProvider>.localProvider: true if msteams service is an on-prem installation

sharedSecrets.confirmationCheat: for bypassing email confirmation, used for unit testing
sharedSecrets.mail: requests to the API server fromm the inbound email server provide this secret. This prevents outside clients from simulating inbound emails
sharedSecrets.subscriptionCheat: allows unregistered users to subscribe to their me-channel, for testing emails
sharedSecrets.telemetry: for accessing the api prior to authentication (pre-auth secret)

segment.webToken: segment web token for the web app
